body: It just makes it possible to lazily initialize THC, even after THD. Instead of giving a `THCState*` (which must be valid) to distributed, you can give it a pointer to the place where `THCState*` will be initialized. You're guaranteed that it will be properly set by the time you get a first CUDA tensor in THD.
